description: This Java source file defines the 'NoteEditFragment' class, a UI component for editing and saving notes within an Android application. It manages the user interface elements for note editing and interacts with the ViewModel to persist data.

classes.name: NoteEditFragment
classes.description: A Fragment class providing a UI to edit and save notes, interfacing with a ViewModel to persist data.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout, initializes UI components, sets up ViewModel, and defines the save note button click behavior.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Collects input data, validates, creates a new Note object, inserts it via ViewModel, and provides user feedback.
